description: Predict every joint's speed and generate motion sequence
README.md:
#Deep Motion Generator

Deep Motion Generator(DMG) uses Deep Convolutional Generative Adversatial Network([http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.06434](http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.06434)).

DMG generates every joint's difference between current frame and next frame.

By combining this with joints' initial values,

you can get a motion sequence data.
